logs.details:
**→** Reworked all commands. Removed unnecessary ones, added new ones.
**→** Added server logs system.
**→** Migrated from Embeds to Message Components v2.

**→** Fixed logging system logging stuff that wasn't supposed to be logged on bot restart.
**→** Added logging for username change, and main pfp change.
**→** Fixed logs again. Excluded bots from member and message events.

**→** Improved logs. (Added user ID to every log, for example)
**→** Added Voice Logs.
**→** Updated Dev-only command `/rules` to fix some errors found.
**→** Updated `/sell`, typo was found.
